ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel arms... ALL MINE.
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats bud, good to know the rest of our armor is available now. Sartori D Elsiraad perma-54th Bard, Veeshan ...
ygData.messageBody:
Grats bud, good to know the rest of our armor is available now.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
perma-54th Bard, Veeshan


>From: "Bobby" <Blackthorn@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel arms... ALL MINE.
>Date: Sun, 2 Jul 2000 10:24:56 -0700
>
>Go MoviesGreetings everyone,
>
>Just thought I would drop a note.... I got my singing steel arms last
>night. I couldnt believe it. It was a guild raide and we had 3 bards
>originally ( the only 3 in the guild) but one had to leave. Down to two.
>Everyone was getting tired , people started talking about leaving.. So the
>leader said one more spawn.. OK.. he pulls a named and poof theres the
>arms... Now I had just gotten a Sebilite Bracer ( 9 ac 4str 4cha only +3
>more cha than lambent bracer and looks like chain) mainly cause noone
>wanted it. So they let me random with the other bard and I rolled a 60 ,,
>ugh... he rolled a 30 something and was crying all over the floor :).
>
>Im so happy I had to post it... more info below
>
>Tuldar Missednote
>50th wood elf bard
>Tarew Marr
>
>
>Spoiler Space

>Found in Sebilis
>Singing Steel Vanbraces: 21 AC Effect: Invigor ( refills stamina) can be
>cast on others.
>Mob that Dropped: Froglock Repairer
>While camping the Dining room he was pulled from somewhere close but not
>IN the dining room.
>
>In comparison Lambent Vanbraces : 11 ac 1cha 2 all resist.
>
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
